name: Soup: The Game (itch) (LunarLoony Interactive)
description:
Help Benny the Bug save his bottle of soup from the evil Spheres of Influence, and their horrific allies, the Pink One-eyed Squids. There are also "thwomps" knocking around, but they're a bit lazy.

This game was made in The Game Factory, using assets from Kenney.

Made for the second Crappy Game Dev stream, where if it's broke, we don't fix it. Watch the stream here: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1709979499

Note: this game was made in outdated software on an outdated computer. While it has been tested and works on Windows 10 64-bit, I make no guarantees that it will work with your setup.
